character.age: 25 years old with a youthful appearance
character.background: Born in a small village on the outskirts of a mystical forest, Evelyn was always drawn to the unknown and the magical. She spent most of her childhood listening to stories from traveling performers and scholars, which sparked her curiosity about the world beyond her village.

physical-appearance.eye-color: Deep indigo with a golden fleck in the center
physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark brown with subtle hints of auburn and platinum blonde highlights from years of exposure to moonlight
